description: This is a product layout view in an ecommerce. It has several sample images that you can click to view in detail. It also features a field to add the quantity of the product, which will be displayed in the cart with its respective value. You can add more products or remove the item.
It is a Pokedex, which allows you to search for pokemon by name, number and type, this app is powered by the pokeApi.
It is a web page, which is built with HTML, SASS, and JavaScript, This project consists of the layout of a static web page, it is responsive, and the menu varies according to the type of device.
This project consists of a website that, by providing the total amount and the number of people, calculates the total and individual tip.

It is a project that consists of developing a memory game, which is based on a 4x4 matrix, where the player when clicking on a card begins time.
